description: 1 x Sycamore (applicants ref. T2) - Reduce height to approximately 2m from ground level, 2m reduction. Remove Ivy.1 Hornbeam (applicants ref. T3) - Reduce branches away from building to create as much clearance as possible without unbalancing crown of tree and shave ivy back to stem. Reduce by approximately 2m. 1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T4) - Reduce branches away from building to create as much clearance as possible without unbalancing crown of tree. Reduce by approximately 2m.1 x Cypress (applicants ref. T6) - Reduce height to approximately 4m from ground level, below gutter height.1 x Hornbeam (applicants ref. T7) - Reduce branches away from building to create as much clearance as possible without unbalancing crown of tree. Reduce by approximately 2m. 2 x Cypress & Holly hedges (applicants ref. T8) - Trim with hedge cutters, trim section in front of garage door close as possible whilst retaining green foliage.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
